9.Pros: This job is very easy. Im able to get better hours than anywhere retail, and 8/hr is better than a lot of part time jobs. I work at a 24 hr. store and my availability changes a lot for school and my second job, the managers are SUPER flexible as long as you're friendly to guests, show up on time, suck up every once in a while and only check your phone every once in a while. Coworkers are friendly and the rude ones don't last too long at my store.
9.Cons: This job is very easy. I get really bored after 5 hours, usually I try not to work more than 6 because Ill start eating all of the nuggets or something. Customers can be so terrible and one even pulled a gun on my coworker, a lot of drunks come through too, and homeless people. You learn to ignore it but Ill pop off on someone every once in a while (and I get away with it because its shade this isn't the Ritz)
